item.title: Traffic lights obscured by trees and vegetation., 30th July
item.description:
Have been reporting this since 2018 but there is no proactive policy on road safety. Could you please just cut it back?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Shipton, Cotswold

item.title: Sign facing wrong way, 29th July
item.description:
As you exit Mill Lane onto Shurdington Road; the sign advising no right turn is about facing. Iâ€™ve seen cars trying to use the main road slip to turn right; thereby encountering head on traffic.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Shipton heights A40 junction trees obscuring traffic lights, 29th July
item.description:
Shipton heights crossroads junction A40 and A436 traffic lights hidden by foliage. First reported may 2024. Still not attended to. Traffic accident hot spot suggests urgent attention.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Shipton, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trailer/car parts/debris on road/pavement, 29th July
item.description:
A435 - EVENSHAM ROAD - NORTHBOUND. JUST AFTER THE RACECOURSE TRAIN STATION There was clearly a crash here on Thursday 25/07/2024 night, as the above items were all across the pavement/edge of road on the Friday morning. I was hoping it would be cleared up over the weekend, but upon walking to work this morning it is still there. The bumpers/trailer need removing and the whole area needs a thorough sweep. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Evesham Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Manhole cover damaged and raised, 29th July
item.description:
This is right outside my driveway on Wellesley road Cheltenham. Earlier today there were workmen connect to a internet provider outside they removed the cover and have no put it back properly and have damaged it too , the edge is metal and sharp and myself and family members park on the driveway I am concerned it will damage our tyres and also others using the lane .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wellesley Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 29th July
item.description:
We waited in a queue of traffic along Wyman's Lane and, when we finally reached the traffic lights at the Safestore junction on Kingsditch Lane, the green light allowed three cars across before changing back to red. There were no cars waiting to turn into the Safestore road, nor any cars waiting to turn out of that road. There were no pedestrians at the crossing either. There has been traffic congestion along Wyman's Lane and Kingsditch Lane for some time now, could the timings of these traffic lights be the cause? Kind regards
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles
